effect.x_y: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.

flavor_text.x_y: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
